perturbation.original_text: 1.3      "Affiliate" means, with respect to any Person, any Person which,          directly or indirectly, controls, is controlled by, or is under common          control with, the specified Person. For purposes of this definition,          the term "control" as applied to any Person, means the possession,          directly or indirectly, of at least fifty-one per cent (51%) of the          power to direct or cause the direction of the management of that          Person, whether&sbsp;through ownership of voting securities or otherwise.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.3      "Affiliate" means, with respect to any Person, any Person which,          directly or indirectly, controls, is controlled by, or is under common          control with, the specified Person. For purposes of this definition,          the term "control" as applied to any Person, means the possession,          directly or indirectly, of at least twenty-five per cent (25%) of the          power to direct or cause the direction of the management of that          Person, whether&sbsp;through ownership of voting securities or otherwise.
perturbation.explanation: The definition of "Affiliate" is changed by altering the percentage of control required. Originally, it stated 51% ownership. Now, it states 25% control. This creates ambiguity about what constitutes an affiliate for purposes of the agreement, potentially leading to disputes over liability or obligations.

perturbation.original_text: 5.4      This Article V shall survive the termination of this Agreement for a          period of ten (10) years, provided, however, that following the          termination of this Agreement LEO shall be free to use all data,          information or other confidential information relating to the          Combination Product and following termination of this Agreement, GALEN          shall be free to use all GALEN Information.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.4      This Article V shall survive the termination of this Agreement indefinitely, provided, however, that following the          termination of this Agreement LEO shall be free to use all data,          information or other confidential information relating to the          Combination Product and following termination of this Agreement, GALEN          shall be free to use all GALEN Information.
perturbation.explanation: The clause originally stated that the confidentiality agreement lasts for 10 years. It is now changed to indefinitely. It creates uncertainty about confidentiality duration.
